EmailTemplate.name: LPAD Assessment Completion Notification for Score E
EmailTemplate.subject: Thankyou for your Assessment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!GLBL_Form_Execution__c.Form_Executor__c}, This is an automated response from the LillyFit Assessment you have completed.
Your idea appears to be a business capability or is suited to a custom technology. A member of the Enterprise Architecture team will contact you in the next few days to review your LillyFit Assessment responses. If you have any questions in the meantime please click below for the LillyFit chatter group.
https://gso.my.salesforce.com/0F9b0000000HbAW
Many thanks,
Cirrus Team
